channel.title: Atelier 7 :: 420-ZG4-MO LINUX
channel.description: Solution des exercices YUM Paquet 01 $ yum provides ifconfig $ sudo yum install -y net-tools Paquet 02 $ yum search speak $ sudo yum install -y kmouth Paquet 03 $ yum search go | grep -i lang $ sudo yum install -y golang Paquet 04 $ yum provides ag $ yum install -y the_silver_searcher Paquet 05 $ yum search disk usage $ sudo yum install -y filelight Paquet 06 $ yum search music $ sudo yum install -y juk Paquet 07 $ yum search game | grep -i memory $ sudo yum install -y blinken Paquet 08 $ yum search office $ sudo yum install -y libreoffice-writer libreoffice-math libreoffice-calc libreoffice-impress ... Cron Cr√©ez un script /home/<user>/script.sh
